nodes.description: A field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed.
A type of machine learning where input data is labeled for training purposes.
A type of machine learning that learns from unlabeled data to discover hidden patterns and intrinsic structures.
A type of machine learning where an agent interacts with an environment to learn behavior through trial-and-error.
A subset of machine learning that uses neural networks with multiple layers for feature extraction and transformation.
Biological brain-inspired systems used in deep learning to model complex patterns in data.
An algorithm for efficiently computing gradients of loss functions with respect to parameters in neural networks.
Functions that introduce non-linearity into the output of a neuron, enabling the network to learn complex patterns.
A function measuring the discrepancy between predicted and actual outcomes used for training models.
An optimization algorithm that iteratively minimizes a cost function by moving in the direction of steepest descent.
A type of machine learning where input data is labeled for training purposes.

A type of machine learning where an agent interacts with an environment to learn behavior through trial-and-error.
